name: horticulturally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to the study or activity of growing fruit, vegetables, or flowers: They organize guided walks through horticulturally interesting parks and woods. This region has a horticulturally oriented cropping pattern, growing mainly tomatoes and potatoes.
More examplesFewer examplesFor the horticulturally inclined, the gardens should hold your interest for hours.The flowers in these gardens will appeal as much to the horticulturally challenged as to the knowledgeable.These improvement programmes are focused on agriculturally or horticulturally important crops.
